main.title: Hi, welcome to my page!
main.description: Fullstack developer passionate about building modern, scalable web applications with great user experiences. Specialized in React, Next.js and Node.js.
main.about-description: Hello! My name is Micael Gomes, I'm a fullstack software developer passionate about technology and challenges. My programming journey began as a self-taught learner at age 12, which helped me develop a creative and proactive approach to problem-solving. I have professional experience with frontend development at Dinheirow, where I work with React, TypeScript and modern web technologies. I also have experience with networking from my time at IFF (Instituto Federal Fluminense) and years of backend freelancing. As a naturally extroverted person, I love working in teams, sharing ideas and constantly looking for ways to create a collaborative and productive environment. I'm always seeking new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.

1.description: Development of web interfaces using React, TypeScript and modern frontend technologies.

2.description: Network infrastructure management and computer systems maintenance.

3.description: Development of APIs and backend services for various clients using Node.js and databases.

mitech.description: Modern landing page for Mitech, built with cutting-edge technologies and stunning animations.

mitechFinance.description: Complete financial management platform with dashboards, reports and transaction tracking.

corteIdeal.description: Full platform for barbershops with scheduling, payments and customer loyalty system.

cinemaScore.description: Project built to solidify learning in React and TypeScript, consuming the TMDB API to display movie and TV show information.

trinno.description: Landing page designed with a focus on converting customers for an accounting firm.
